Delta Airlines

Logistician

Within this position I was a logistics attendant in the TechOps department. This roled required me to exhibit extreme attention to detail when handling parts for an aircraft.

Patient Access Reprensentative

In this position I communicated directly with doctors and nurses to ensure patient satisfaction. Also implemented new process to streamline care for patients.

Front Desk Receptionist

Working in such a fast-paced and ever changing environment showed me how to multi-task very well. In this role I had to at any given time answer mulitple phone calls as well as checking patients in to see the doctor. While handling all tasks I made sure to priortize and structure my work day to best fit patients needs.
